#summary Changelog for Invigoration starting with 1.2.5.
#labels Featured,Phase-Design

= Invigoration 1.2.x Changelog =<br>
 ----<br>
*1.2.9* ---
_Released 9/14/2010_<br>
 * Fixed Configuration Screen glitches
 * Added support for 0ms Ping
 * Added support for -1ms Ping
 * Started work on flag modifications (eventually allowing users to set flags)
 * *RESOLVED* Glitch with connection that would fail unexpectedly
 * *RESOLVED* User not being able to 'Focus' on Moderators in channel.
 * *FEATURE* Added BNU`Bot and BNET.cc icons to Invigoration (Currently hardcoded, eventually added with flags feature)
 * *TODO*: Ping Spoof Option (Wait time in ms)
 * *TODO*: Clan Creation/Accept/Decline options. (TO handle Voided/Muted users also)
 * * This may result in a separate clan creation program entirely.. not sure yet.
 * *RESOLVED* When account is closed, would crash bot. (Status Code handler added to packet)
 * *RESOLVED* Color Codes not working properly<br>

*1.2.5* ---
_Released 9/12/2010_<br>
 * Automatically reconnects after creation of an account
 * Fixed connection issues from 1.2.4
 * Began work on code to streamline connection speed.
 * Removed outdated/old code from bot (All depreciated code)
 * Updated links to proper update websites..
 * Added VersionCheck (1.2.4+)
 * Removed vercheck backdoor (Ability to check versions in channel, from Pre-Release)
 * Re-added CDKey2, in preparation to repair code to allow for D2XP and W3XP connections
 * Added BNLS/JBLS configuration, users can now input their own server info (Defaults to bnls.net)<br>
----
